statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE risk_preference = 'High'
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE investment_amount > 5000
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, risk_preference FROM customer_behavior
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior WHERE risk_preference = 'low' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' AND risk_preference = 'high' AND investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type IN ('view', 'purchase') GROUP BY customer_id HAVING behavior_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase';
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT behavior_description FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'login' AND customer_id = 1001;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_level FROM investment_strategies WHERE risk_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND behavior_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) as behavior_count FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type HAVING behavior_count > 5 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_description FROM customer_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'signup' AND LENGTH(behavior_description) > 50 ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.behavior_type, i.strategy_name FROM customer_behavior c JOIN investment_strategies i ON c.customer_id = i.strategy_id WHERE c.behavior_type = 'purchase' AND i.risk_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase'
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT strategy_name, risk_level FROM InvestmentStrategy WHERE risk_level = 3
SELECT * FROM RiskManagement ORDER BY risk_id ASC
SELECT strategy_name, created_date FROM InvestmentStrategy WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%Aggressive%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_level FROM InvestmentStrategy WHERE risk_level > 3 ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagement ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM CustomerBehavior JOIN RiskManagement ON CustomerBehavior.customer_id = RiskManagement.risk_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_balance FROM Customers WHERE customer_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM Customers JOIN Recommendations ON Customers.customer_id = Recommendations.customer_id JOIN InvestmentProducts ON Recommendations.recommended_product_id = InvestmentProducts.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM InvestmentProducts WHERE product_category = 'Technology' ORDER BY product_price DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT customer_name, product_name, recommendation_date FROM Customers c JOIN Recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN InvestmentProducts p ON r.recommended_product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_balance < 5000 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, customer_email ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;

SELECT portfolio_name, investment_name, risk_score FROM portfolios JOIN investments ON portfolios.investment_id = investments.investment_id JOIN risk_profiles ON portfolios.risk_profile_id = risk_profiles.profile_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, investment_name, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN portfolios ON customers.customer_id = portfolios.customer_id INNER JOIN investments ON portfolios.investment_id = investments.investment_id WHERE portfolios.risk_profile_id = 1;

SELECT customer_name, transaction_type, amount FROM customers INNER JOIN portfolios ON customers.customer_id = portfolios.customer_id INNER JOIN investments ON portfolios.investment_id = investments.investment_id INNER JOIN transactions ON investments.investment_id = transactions.investment_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;

SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers INNER JOIN portfolios ON customers.customer_id = portfolios.customer_id WHERE portfolios.investment_id IN (SELECT investment_id FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
